item.description:
We will continue with Bacon's utopia The New Atlantis ((Dover Publications ISBN: 0486430820 , 40 pages). Following that we will read Bacon's New Organon (Publisher: Cambridge University Press; New Ed edition (December 12, 2002); ISBN: 0521564832). This is a longer piece it probably will take 3 meetings.

As usual there is plenty of information available on the internet about Francis Bacon and philosophy in general (start with The Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy):
The Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy: http://www.utm.edu/re...
Philosophy Pages: http://www.philosophy...
Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy: http://plato.stanford...
The Catholic Encyclopedia: http://www.newadvent....
item.name: Francis Bacon: The New Atlantis
